titleInfo.title: EEWW - A GENERATOR FOR E+E--]W+W- INCLUDING ONE-LOOP AND LEADING PHOTONIC 2-LOOP CORRECTIONS

mods.abstract: We describe a generator for the process e+e- --> W+W- including all one-loop and leading log photonic two-loop contributions. It includes polarization of the beam and W bosons, and the possibility to study the effect of anomalous couplings.

bibliographicCitation.aps: J. Fleischer, et al., EEWW - A GENERATOR FOR E+E--]W+W- INCLUDING ONE-LOOP AND LEADING PHOTONIC 2-LOOP CORRECTIONS, COMPUTER PHYSICS COMMUNICATIONS 85, 29-39 (1995).
